markdownRemark.html:
So let me paint the scene for you first:

I'm not normally fond of Web development. I'd much prefer write a program in Python or Java or (even C# for that matter) than spend my time mucking around with dozens of different frameworks, convetions, etc.


However; I'm not blind, nor am I stupid. I'm very aware that Web development is the way of the future in this industry and I'd like not to be left behind before I've even gotten a job. I've been meaning to buid myself a personal blog / portfolio for a few months now - but I didn't know where to start.



So what is GatsbyJS?
